name: Arx
description: The Arx is a Large Fiend with a solid build, showcasing a fearsome appearance and natural armor. It is characterized by its towering stature and formidable claws, along with spiky hide that deters close-range attackers.
memorable: The Arx can control the battlefield with its Emplace Wall ability, creating barriers and inflicting damage with its Wall Smash that crushes enemies caught within.
goals: To dominate its opponents and manipulate the battlefield to its advantage.
relations: It can ally with other fiends or command lesser demons and creatures.
environment: Typically found in infernal domains or corrupted lands.
strengths: High physical strength and significant damage resistances to elemental attacks.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity makes it vulnerable to ranged attacks.
attacks: The Arx unleashes powerful melee attacks with its claws and spear, dealing slashing and piercing damage, while also creating hazardous walls.
most_powerful_ability: Wall Smash which can deal substantial bludgeoning damage in a wide area and control enemy movement.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 90 feet and a passive Perception of 16.
skills: Proficient in Athletics and has a decent Perception skill.
additional_information: Immune to any form-altering magic due to Immutable Form.
Has advantage on saving throws against spells with Magic Resistance.
Deals piercing damage to anyone who touches it or attacks it in melee range with Spiky Hide.
